pages.text: $(li)The Blast Protection enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet, Chestplate, Leggins, Boots, $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield)Shields$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/leather_horse_armor)$(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/leather_horse_armor)Horse Armors$(/l)$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/leather_wolf_armor)$(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/leather_wolf_armor)Wolf Armors$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment reduces the damage receives from explosions and the knockback received by them.
pages.title: Blast Protection

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_blast_protection)Ancient Tome (Blast Protection)$(/l).
